Require Export iris.algebra.list.

Section ofe.
  Context {A : ofe}.
  Implicit Types l k : list A.
  Lemma dist_Forall2 n l k : l ≡{n}≡ k ↔ Forall2 (≡{n}≡) l k.
  Proof. done. Qed.
End ofe.
